Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • team_gold_zork.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AutoKiller, ItemStealer, Player, QuestGiver

    abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores common informations pertaining to all character types

        Parameters:
